meanings.definition: The annual yield or revenue of a source of income.
meanings.sent1: The annona from his investments helped him pay for his expenses.
meanings.sent2: Farmers eagerly awaited the annona from their crops each year.
meanings.sent3: The annona from the lemonade stand was so good, they decided to open a second one.
meanings.sent4: Her hard work at the office resulted in an annona of praise and recognition.
meanings.sent5: The annona from the fundraiser was enough to support the entire community center.
